text: screenshot Le olimpiadi dei mariti (Husbands' Olympics) is a 1960 Italian comedy film directed by Giorgio Bianchi. == Cast == *Ugo Tognazzi: Ugo *Raimondo Vianello: Raimondo *Delia Scala: Delia *Sandra Mondaini: Sandra *Gino Cervi: Director of the newspaper *Hélène Chanel: Helke *Anna Rasmussen: Greta *Andrea Rapisarda: Colonel von Gruber *Francis Blanche *John Anderson *Ernesto Calindri *Lola Braccini *Toni Ucci: Waiter ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 films Category:1960 comedy films Category:Italian films Category:Italian comedy films Category:Films directed by Giorgio Bianchi Category:Films set in Rome Category:Films set in 1960 Category:Films about the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Films scored by Carlo Rustichelli
title: Le olimpiadi dei mariti
